languages.text: "Сколь болезнен град этих несправедливых упреков. Хорошо, шерин. Я больше не потревожу вашего казначея. Хотя я и нахожу весьма странным ваше доверие к человеку, скрывающему под унциями духов свой настоящий запах. Все знают, что это — верный признак склонности сердца к обману". {n}Мстительно пройдясь по ноге фактотума, Джай уходит — наверняка обдумывать новую гадость для ушей Данрока.{/n}

"These unjust reproaches are like a hailstorm upon my soul. All right, shereen. I will not trouble your treasurer again. Although I find it very strange that you trust a man who hides his real smell under lashings of perfume. Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of the heart's proclivity for deception." {n}Jae leaves, vindictively treading on the Factotum's foot as she goes, no doubt already plotting a new affront to Danrok's ears.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сколь болезнен град этих несправедливых упреков. Хорошо, шерин. Я больше не потревожу вашего казначея. Хотя я и нахожу весьма странным ваше доверие к человеку, скрывающему под унциями духов свой настоящий запах. Все знают, что это — верный признак склонности сердца к обману". {n}Мстительно пройдясь по ноге фактотума, Джай уходит — наверняка обдумывать новую гадость для ушей Данрока.{/n}

Although I find it very strange that you trust a man who hides his real smell under lashings of perfume. Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of the heart's proclivity for deception." {n}Jae leaves, vindictively treading on the Factotum's foot as she goes, no doubt already plotting a new affront to Danrok's ears.{/n}

languages.text: “多么不公正的指责，就像冰雹一样砸在我的灵魂上。好吧，亲爱的，我不会再找你的财务官的麻烦了。不过，你居然会相信一个用香水掩盖体臭的人，这真让我意外。每个人都知道，这种人最擅长欺骗他人。”{n}婕伊离开的时候，故意狠狠踩在了高阶顾问脚上作为报复。毫无疑问，她已经在计划如何用新的手段来收拾丹罗克了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "These unjust reproaches are like a hailstorm upon my soul. All right, shereen. I will not trouble your treasurer again. Although I find it very strange that you trust a man who hides his real smell under lashings of perfume. Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of the heart's proclivity for deception." {n}Jae leaves, vindictively treading on the Factotum's foot as she goes, no doubt already plotting a new affront to Danrok's ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “多么不公正的指责，就像冰雹一样砸在我的灵魂上。好吧，亲爱的，我不会再找你的财务官的麻烦了。不过，你居然会相信一个用香水掩盖体臭的人，这真让我意外。每个人都知道，这种人最擅长欺骗他人。”{n}婕伊离开的时候，故意狠狠踩在了高阶顾问脚上作为报复。毫无疑问，她已经在计划如何用新的手段来收拾丹罗克了。{/n}

languages.text: 「こんな不当な非難は、あたしの魂に降り注ぐ嵐のようなものだよ。わかったよ、シャリーン。もう二度とあんたの金庫番には迷惑をかけないさ。でも、香水を振りまいて本当の臭いを隠しているような男をあんたが信用するのは、とてもおかしいことだね。それが心を欺こうとする性質の表出だってことは、誰でも知ってることなのにさ」{n}ジェイはファクトタムの足を念入りに踏みつけてから去っていった。すでにダンロックに新しい侮辱を浴びせかける用意をしているのは明らかだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "These unjust reproaches are like a hailstorm upon my soul. All right, shereen. I will not trouble your treasurer again. Although I find it very strange that you trust a man who hides his real smell under lashings of perfume. Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of the heart's proclivity for deception." {n}Jae leaves, vindictively treading on the Factotum's foot as she goes, no doubt already plotting a new affront to Danrok's ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「こんな不当な非難は、あたしの魂に降り注ぐ嵐のようなものだよ。わかったよ、シャリーン。もう二度とあんたの金庫番には迷惑をかけないさ。でも、香水を振りまいて本当の臭いを隠しているような男をあんたが信用するのは、とてもおかしいことだね。それが心を欺こうとする性質の表出だってことは、誰でも知ってることなのにさ」{n}ジェイはファクトタムの足を念入りに踏みつけてから去っていった。すでにダンロックに新しい侮辱を浴びせかける用意をしているのは明らかだ。{/n}

languages.text: «Estos reproches injustos son como una granizada contra mi alma. De acuerdo, shereen. No molestaré más a su tesorero. Debo admitir que me sorprende que confíe en un hombre que oculta su verdadero olor con perfumes. Todo el mundo sabe que es una señal segura de un corazón engañoso». {n}Jae se marcha, pisando vengativa al Factótum al salir y seguramente tramando una nueva afrenta contra Danrok.{/n}
languages.original_text: "These unjust reproaches are like a hailstorm upon my soul. All right, shereen. I will not trouble your treasurer again. Although I find it very strange that you trust a man who hides his real smell under lashings of perfume. Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of the heart's proclivity for deception." {n}Jae leaves, vindictively treading on the Factotum's foot as she goes, no doubt already plotting a new affront to Danrok's ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estos reproches injustos son como una granizada contra mi alma. De acuerdo, shereen. No molestaré más a su tesorero. Debo admitir que me sorprende que confíe en un hombre que oculta su verdadero olor con perfumes. Todo el mundo sabe que es una señal segura de un corazón engañoso». {n}Jae se marcha, pisando vengativa al Factótum al salir y seguramente tramando una nueva afrenta contra Danrok.{/n}

languages.text: « Ces reproches injustes sont comme un orage de grêle sur mon âme. Eh bien, soit, shereen. Je ne viendrai plus embêter votre trésorier, même si je persiste à trouver fort étrange la confiance que vous accordez à un homme masquant sa véritable odeur sous un déluge de parfum. Tout le monde sait qu'il faut y voir le signe d'un cœur enclin à la tromperie. » {n}Jae s'en va, écrasant au passage le pied de Danrok. Vous ne doutez pas un seul instant qu'elle prépare déjà un nouvel affront à l'encontre du factotum.{/n}
languages.original_text: "These unjust reproaches are like a hailstorm upon my soul. All right, shereen. I will not trouble your treasurer again. Although I find it very strange that you trust a man who hides his real smell under lashings of perfume. Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of the heart's proclivity for deception." {n}Jae leaves, vindictively treading on the Factotum's foot as she goes, no doubt already plotting a new affront to Danrok's ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ces reproches injustes sont comme un orage de grêle sur mon âme. Eh bien, soit, shereen. Je ne viendrai plus embêter votre trésorier, même si je persiste à trouver fort étrange la confiance que vous accordez à un homme masquant sa véritable odeur sous un déluge de parfum. Tout le monde sait qu'il faut y voir le signe d'un cœur enclin à la tromperie. » {n}Jae s'en va, écrasant au passage le pied de Danrok. Vous ne doutez pas un seul instant qu'elle prépare déjà un nouvel affront à l'encontre du factotum.{/n}

languages.text: "Diese ungerechten Vorwürfe fegen wie Hagelsturm über meine Seele hinweg. Also gut, Shereen. Ich werde Euren Schatzmeister nicht mehr behelligen. Obwohl ich es äußerst merkwürdig finde, dass Ihr einem Mann vertraut, der seinen natürlichen Geruch unter Bergen von Parfüm versteckt. Dabei weiß doch jeder, dass so etwas nur jemand mit betrügerischem Herzen macht." {n}Jae geht und tritt rachsüchtig auf den Fuß des Faktotums. Zweifelsohne hat sie dabei schon den nächsten Affront gegen Danrok im Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "These unjust reproaches are like a hailstorm upon my soul. All right, shereen. I will not trouble your treasurer again. Although I find it very strange that you trust a man who hides his real smell under lashings of perfume. Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of the heart's proclivity for deception." {n}Jae leaves, vindictively treading on the Factotum's foot as she goes, no doubt already plotting a new affront to Danrok's ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese ungerechten Vorwürfe fegen wie Hagelsturm über meine Seele hinweg. Also gut, Shereen. Ich werde Euren Schatzmeister nicht mehr behelligen. Obwohl ich es sehr äußerst merkwürdig finde, dass Ihr einem Mann vertraut, der seinen natürlichen Geruch unter Bergen von Parfüm versteckt. Dabei weiß doch jeder, dass so etwas nur jemand mit betrügerischem Herzen macht." {n}Jae geht und tritt rachsüchtig auf den Fuß des Faktotums. Zweifelsohne hat sie dabei schon den nächsten Affront gegen Danrok im Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu haksız serzenişler, ruhuma bir kar fırtınası etkisi yapıyor âdeta. Pekâlâ şirinim. Hazinecinin canını bir daha sıkmayacağım. Fakat gerçek kokusunu, üzerine parfüm boca ederek gizleyen bir adama güveniyor oluşunu çok tuhaf buldum. Bunun, kalbin aldatmacaya meyilli olduğunun kesin bir göstergesi olduğunu herkes bilir." {n}Ortamdan ayrılan Jae, giderken Kâhya'nın ayağına kindarca basıyor. Şimdiden Danrok'un başını ağrıtacak yeni bir komplo kurduğuna eminsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "These unjust reproaches are like a hailstorm upon my soul. All right, shereen. I will not trouble your treasurer again. Although I find it very strange that you trust a man who hides his real smell under lashings of perfume. Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of the heart's proclivity for deception." {n}Jae leaves, vindictively treading on the Factotum's foot as she goes, no doubt already plotting a new affront to Danrok's ears.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu haksız serzenişler ruhuma bir kar fırtınası etkisi yapıyor âdeta. Pekâlâ şirinim. Hazinecinin canını bir daha sıkmayacağım. Ama gerçek kokusunu, üzerine parfüm boca ederek gizleyen bir adama güveniyor oluşunu çok tuhaf buldum. Bunun, kalbin aldatmacaya meyilli olduğunun kesin bir göstergesi olduğunu herkes bilir." {n}Jae ortamdan ayrılıyor, giderken de Kâhya'nın ayağına kindarca basıyor. Şimdiden Danrok'un başını ağrıtacak yeni bir komplo kurduğuna şüphe yok.{/n}
